text: Helga Guitton (born 18 December 1942) is a German radio and television presenter. She was a disc jockey on Radio Luxemburg. She was the presenter of the Eurovision Song Contest 1973. ==References== * http://wn.com/Helga_Guitton Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:German television presenters Category:Eurovision Song Contest presenters
title: Helga Guitton
